config.runVanessa.vanessaEpfPath.descrip: Path to vanessa-automation.epf for built-in Vanessa launch from Test Manager (absolute or relative to workspace root).
config.runVanessa.runtimeDirectory.descr: Directory for Vanessa runtime files (scenario log/status). Absolute or relative to workspace root.
config.runVanessa.commandTemplate.descri: Shell command template for launching Vanessa Automation for a selected scenario.
config.runVanessa.commandTemplate.markdo:
Optional command template used by the run icon in Test Manager.

Available placeholders:
- `${scenarioName}` / `${scenarioNameQuoted}`
- `${featurePath}` / `${featurePathQuoted}`
- `${jsonPath}` / `${jsonPathQuoted}`
- `${workspaceRoot}` / `${workspaceRootQuoted}`

If empty, the extension uses built-in Vanessa launch logic (1C + vanessa-automation.epf + StartFeaturePlayer).
config.runVanessa.checkUnsafeActionProte: Before built-in Vanessa launch, verify DisableUnsafeActionProtection in conf.cfg for EmptyInfobase and offer to patch conf.cfg if missing.
Live run log refresh interval in seconds for running scenarios.
